attributes.action: Utilise the internet and mobile phones to hold regular referenda on issues of popular concern.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This being the communications age, we now have the means to properly engage in the democratic process, no longer at the mercy of the twitterings of a few egocentric, non-responsive elected representatives.  Signing this petition will state your endorsement of the principal of an 'Electro-cracy' - a process through which contentious issues such as; foreign policy, road pricing, MP salaries, prison sentences and a like, can be voted for in a monthly referendum, where votes are registered over the internet, by text message or through a telephone hotline.  This will (with refinement) ingender a new sense of political involvement, where government policy is truly indicative of societal conscience.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=referendum
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
